alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 3:14AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sullivan, Lackawanna, southern Wayne, central Luzerne, northwestern Pike and southeastern Wyoming Counties through 415 AM EST... At 314 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Royal to Conyngham. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Hazleton, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Carbondale, Old Forge and Pittston. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 202. Interstate 84 between 1 and 30. Interstate 380 between 13 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
